token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params['retail_source']="test"
params['price']=99933

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.retail.product.sell.sku.info.update', '3.0.0', 'POST', params=params, files=files)
